mississippi.desc: Crossing the Mississippi at LaCrosse, WI. I was super excited in the beginning so I was taking lots of pictures

grandTeton.desc: Cloudy day at Grand Teton National Park but it  was still incredible to see. Gives me a reason to go back.

cityOfAngels.desc: Spent the night in downtown LA watching baseball. LA is cool.

santaMonica.desc: Alpha and I spent an entire day on the beach relaxing and planning our next moves. The warm weather felt good after Wyoming and the Pacific Northwest.

image.alt: Me and Alpha at the beach

rockies.desc: Didn't have time to drive up Pike's Peak but still got great views of the mountains in Colorado. I definately have to come back to explore more.
